tips.title: Inama
tips.dualSim: Ku bakoresheje SIM ebyiri, hitamo SIM ikwiye
tips.balance: Reba amafaranga yawe mbere yo kwishyura

faq.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faq.q1: Bitwara igihe kingana iki kugira ngo ishyuramihigo ryanjye ryemezwe?
faq.q2: Nibanditse nomero itari yo ni gute?
faq.a2: Hamagara umuyobozi wa SACCO yawe ako kanya.
faq.a3: Oya, ishyuramihigo rya mobile money rirangira vuba kandi ntirishobora guhagarikwa.
